testcase.name: Product Tasks - CRUD Operations › should display product tasks page with create button
Product Tasks - CRUD Operations › should open create task dialog when clicking add button
Product Tasks - CRUD Operations › should create new standalone task with valid data
Product Tasks - CRUD Operations › should edit task title and description
Product Tasks - CRUD Operations › should delete task with confirmation
Product Tasks - Status Workflow › should progress task from todo to in_progress
Product Tasks - Status Workflow › should progress task from in_progress to done
Product Tasks - Status Workflow › should display tasks grouped by status in board view
Product Tasks - Status Workflow › should handle blocked status appropriately
Product Tasks - Assignment › should display assigned user avatar on task card
Product Tasks - Assignment › should show only team members in assignment dropdown
Product Tasks - Assignment › should allow unassigning task
Product Tasks - Statistics › should display task completion percentage
Product Tasks - Statistics › should show status breakdown counts
Product Tasks - Statistics › should update stats when task status changes
Product Tasks - Statistics › should filter tasks and update display accordingly
Product Tasks - Convert to Work Item › should open convert to work item dialog
Product Tasks - Convert to Work Item › should convert standalone task to work item
Product Tasks - Convert to Work Item › should show option to keep task linked after conversion
Product Tasks - Convert to Work Item › should not allow converting linked tasks
Product Tasks - Type and Priority › should display task type badges
Product Tasks - Type and Priority › should display priority indicators
Product Tasks - Type and Priority › should filter tasks by type
